components.name: ComboComponent
components.templateData:
<!--Singe select-->
<ng-container *ngIf="singleMenuTrigger && !groupTitle">
  <p-menu-single-select [menuList]="singleMenuList"
                        [buttonFirst]="buttonFirst"
                        [buttonLast]="buttonLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-input-text [value]="singleMenuTrigger.value"
                  [ariaLabel]="singleMenuTrigger.ariaLabel"
                  [iconName]="singleMenuTrigger.iconName"></p-input-text>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-single-select>
</ng-container>

<ng-container *ngIf="singleMenuTrigger && groupTitle && !filterPlaceholder">
  <p-menu-single-select [menuList]="singleMenuList"
                        [groupTitle]="groupTitle"
                        [buttonFirst]="buttonFirst"
                        [buttonLast]="buttonLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-input-text [value]="singleMenuTrigger.value"
                  [ariaLabel]="singleMenuTrigger.ariaLabel"
                  [iconName]="singleMenuTrigger.iconName"></p-input-text>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-single-select>
</ng-container>

<ng-container *ngIf="singleMenuTrigger && groupTitle && filterPlaceholder">
  <p-menu-single-select [menuList]="singleMenuList"
                        [groupTitle]="groupTitle"
                        [filterAriaLabel]="filterAriaLabel"
                        [filterPlaceholder]="filterPlaceholder"
                        [buttonFirst]="buttonFirst"
                        [buttonLast]="buttonLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-action-button [label]="singleMenuTrigger.label"
                     [iconBeforeName]="singleMenuTrigger.iconBeforeName"
                     [iconBeforeWidth]="singleMenuTrigger.iconBeforeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeHeight]="singleMenuTrigger.iconBeforeHeight"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeWidth]="singleMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeColor]="singleMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeColor"
                     [isMenuTrigger]="true"
                     [isStandalone]="singleMenuTrigger.isStandalone"></p-action-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-single-select>
</ng-container>

<!--Multi select-->
<ng-container *ngIf="multiMenuTrigger && !filterPlaceholder && !headerBtnFirst">
  <p-menu-multi-select [menuList]="multiMenuList"
                        [headerBtnFirst]="headerBtnFirst"
                        [headerBtnLast]="headerBtnLast"
                        [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                        [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-action-button [label]="multiMenuTrigger.label"
                     [iconBeforeName]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeName"
                     [iconBeforeWidth]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeHeight]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeHeight"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeWidth]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeColor]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeColor"
                     [isMenuTrigger]="true"
                     [isStandalone]="multiMenuTrigger.isStandalone"></p-action-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-multi-select>
</ng-container>

<ng-container *ngIf="multiMenuTrigger && filterPlaceholder && !headerBtnFirst && !hashtagList">
  <p-menu-multi-select [menuList]="multiMenuList"
                       [filterPlaceholder]="filterPlaceholder"
                       [filterAriaLabel]="filterAriaLabel"
                       [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                       [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-action-button [label]="multiMenuTrigger.label"
                     [iconBeforeName]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeName"
                     [iconBeforeWidth]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeHeight]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeHeight"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeWidth]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeColor]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeColor"
                     [isMenuTrigger]="true"
                     [isStandalone]="multiMenuTrigger.isStandalone"></p-action-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-multi-select>
</ng-container>

<ng-container *ngIf="multiMenuTrigger && filterPlaceholder && !headerBtnFirst && hashtagList">
  <p-menu-multi-select [menuList]="multiMenuList"
                       [filterPlaceholder]="filterPlaceholder"
                       [filterAriaLabel]="filterAriaLabel"
                       [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                       [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast"
                       (onSelectCompleted)="selectCompleted($event)">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-hashtag-bar [hashtagList]="hashtagList"></p-hashtag-bar>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-multi-select>
</ng-container>

<ng-container *ngIf="multiMenuTrigger && filterPlaceholder && headerBtnFirst">
  <p-menu-multi-select [menuList]="multiMenuList"
                       [filterPlaceholder]="filterPlaceholder"
                       [filterAriaLabel]="filterAriaLabel"
                       [headerBtnFirst]="headerBtnFirst"
                       [headerBtnLast]="headerBtnLast"
                       [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                       [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-action-button [label]="multiMenuTrigger.label"
                     [iconBeforeName]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeName"
                     [iconBeforeWidth]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeHeight]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeHeight"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeWidth]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeWidth"
                     [iconBeforeStrokeColor]="multiMenuTrigger.iconBeforeStrokeColor"
                     [isMenuTrigger]="true"
                     [isStandalone]="multiMenuTrigger.isStandalone"></p-action-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-multi-select>
</ng-container>

<!--Radio group-->
<ng-container *ngIf="radioMenuTrigger">
  <p-menu-radio-group [menuList]="radioMenuList"
                      [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                      [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-chip-button [label]="radioMenuTrigger.label"
                    [values]="radioMenuTrigger.values"
                    [iconRemove]="radioMenuTrigger.iconRemove"
                    [full]="radioMenuTrigger.full"
                    [active]="radioMenuTrigger.active"
                    (onClickTask)="openRadioMenu()"></p-chip-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-radio-group>
</ng-container>

<!--Tabs-->
<ng-container *ngIf="tabsMenuTrigger">
  <p-menu-tabs [menuList]="tabsMenuList"
               [filterPlaceholder]="filterPlaceholder"
               [filterAriaLabel]="filterAriaLabel"
               [headerBtnFirst]="headerBtnFirst"
               [headerBtnLast]="headerBtnLast"
               [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
               [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast"
               [checkboxList]="checkboxList"
               (onClickTask)="publishArray($event, tabsMenuTrigger)">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-chip-button [label]="tabsMenuTrigger.label"
                   [values]="tabsMenuTrigger.values"
                   [iconRemove]="tabsMenuTrigger.iconRemove"
                   [full]="tabsMenuTrigger.full"
                   [active]="tabsMenuTrigger.active"
                   (onClickTask)="openTabsMenu()"></p-chip-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-tabs>
</ng-container>

<!--Range-->
<ng-container *ngIf="rangeMenuTrigger">
  <p-menu-range [inputMax]="inputMax"
                [inputMin]="inputMin"
                [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-chip-button [label]="rangeMenuTrigger.label"
                   [values]="rangeMenuTrigger.values"
                   [iconRemove]="rangeMenuTrigger.iconRemove"
                   [full]="rangeMenuTrigger.full"
                   [active]="rangeMenuTrigger.active"
                   (onClickTask)="openRangeMenu()"></p-chip-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-range>
</ng-container>

<!--Range-->
<ng-container *ngIf="freeTextMenuTrigger">
  <p-menu-free-text [menuList]="freeTextMenuList"
                    [footerBtnFirst]="footerBtnFirst"
                    [footerBtnLast]="footerBtnLast">
    <!--ng-content-->
    <p-chip-button [label]="freeTextMenuTrigger.label"
                   [values]="freeTextMenuTrigger.values"
                   [iconRemove]="freeTextMenuTrigger.iconRemove"
                   [full]="freeTextMenuTrigger.full"
                   [active]="freeTextMenuTrigger.active"
                   (onClickTask)="openFreeTextMenu()"></p-chip-button>
    <!-- -->
  </p-menu-free-text>
</ng-container>

components.name: IconComponent
InputHeaderComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-outline p-input-header"
                appearance="outline"
                [ngClass]="{'p-input-readonly' : readonlyState, 'no-error-message': !errorMessage}"
                floatLabel="always">

  <input matInput
         #inputField
         [type]="type"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonlyState"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         [errorStateMatcher]="matcher"
         autocomplete="off"
         (focus)="onInputFocused()"
         (blur)="onInputBlur()"
         class="p-input-text-input"
         [class.readonly]="readonlyState">

  <p-icon class="p-input-outline-icon"
          matSuffix
          iconName="edit-2"
          width="18"
          height="auto">
  </p-icon>

</mat-form-field>

components.name: InputLinkComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-text p-input-link p-input-text-readonly"
                appearance="standard"
                floatLabel="always">
  <p-icon *ngIf="formFieldControl.value === ''"
          class="p-input-link-prefix"
          matPrefix
          iconName="link"
          width="16"
          height="16">
  </p-icon>
  <input matInput
         type="text"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="true"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         [errorStateMatcher]="matcher"
         (click)="openModal()"
         class="p-input-text-input"
         [matTooltip]="value"
         matTooltipPosition="above"
         matTooltipClass="p-tooltip above">

  <p-button *ngIf="formFieldControl.value !== ''"
            class="p-input-text-icon edit-link"
            matSuffix
            ariaLabel="Edit Link"
            [buttonType]="buttonType.IsIcon"
            iconBefore="link"
            iconBeforeWidth="16"
            (onClickTask)="openModal()"
            matTooltip="Edit Link"
            matTooltipPosition="above"
            matTooltipClass="p-tooltip above"></p-button>

  <p-button *ngIf="formFieldControl.value !== ''"
            class="p-input-text-icon remove-link"
            matSuffix
            ariaLabel="Unlink"
            [buttonType]="buttonType.IsIcon"
            iconBefore="unlink"
            iconBeforeWidth="16"
            iconBeforeHeight="16"
            (onClickTask)="removeLink()"
            matTooltip="Unlink"
            matTooltipPosition="above"
            matTooltipClass="p-tooltip above"></p-button>

  <mat-error *ngIf="formFieldControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: InputNumericComponent
components.templateData: {{errorMessage}}

components.name: InputOutlineComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-outline"
                appearance="outline"
                [ngClass]="{'p-input-readonly' : readonly, 'no-error-message': !errorMessage}"
                floatLabel="always">

  <mat-label class="p-input-text-label paragraph-3-default">{{label}}</mat-label>

  <input matInput
         [type]="type"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonly"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         [errorStateMatcher]="matcher"
         autocomplete="off"
         onfocus="this.select()"
         class="p-input-text-input">

  <button *ngIf="isSearch && formFieldControl.value"
          matSuffix
          aria-label="Clear"
          class="p-input-outline-button"
          (click)="clearValue()">
    <p-icon class="p-input-outline-icon-clear"
            iconName="x"
            width="16"
            height="auto">
    </p-icon>
  </button>

  <button *ngIf="isSearch && !formFieldControl.value"
          matSuffix
          aria-label="Search"
          class="p-input-outline-button"
          (click)="searchValue()">
    <p-icon class="p-input-outline-icon-search"
            iconName="search"
            width="16"
            height="auto">
    </p-icon>
  </button>

  <p-icon *ngIf="iconName && !isSearch"
          class="p-input-outline-icon"
          matSuffix
          [iconName]="iconName"
          width="16"
          height="auto"
          stroke="#B3B3B3">
  </p-icon>

  <mat-error *ngIf="formFieldControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: InputTextComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-text"
                appearance="standard"
                [ngClass]="{'p-input-text-readonly' : readonly}"
                floatLabel="always">
  <mat-label class="p-input-text-label paragraph-3-default">{{label}}</mat-label>
  <input matInput
         [type]="type"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonly"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         [errorStateMatcher]="matcher"
         onfocus="this.select()"
         class="p-input-text-input">
  <p-icon *ngIf="iconName"
          class="p-input-text-icon"
          matSuffix
          [iconName]="iconName"
          width="16"
          height="16">
  </p-icon>
  <mat-error *ngIf="formFieldControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

                  [value]="value"

components.name: RadioButtonGroupComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-radio-group class="p-radio-group"
                 [formControl]="fieldFormControl">
  <label class="p-radio-group-label">{{label}}</label>
  <p-radio-button class="p-radio-group-option"
                  *ngFor="let option of optionsList"
                  [value]="option"
                  [label]="option.label"
                  [ariaLabel]="option.ariaLabel"
                  [checked]="option.checked"
                  [disabled]="option.disabled">
  </p-radio-button>
  <mat-error *ngIf="fieldFormControl.errors"
              class="p-radio-group-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-radio-group>

components.name: SlideToggleComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-slide-toggle
  class="p-slide-toggle"
  [(ngModel)]="checked"
  [aria-label]="ariaLabel"
  [checked]="checked"
  [disabled]="disabled"
  [matTooltip]="labelActive ? tooltipText : null"
  matTooltipPosition="above"
  matTooltipClass="p-tooltip above">
  <ng-container *ngIf="labelInactive">
    <ng-template [ngIf]="checked" [ngIfElse]="notChecked">
      {{labelActive}}
    </ng-template>
    <ng-template #notChecked>
      {{labelInactive}}
    </ng-template>
  </ng-container>
</mat-slide-toggle>

components.name: TextareaComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-outline p-textarea"
                appearance="outline"
                floatLabel="always"
                [ngClass]="classes">

  <mat-label class="p-input-text-label paragraph-3-default">{{label}}</mat-label>

  <textarea matInput
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonly"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="formFieldControl"
         [errorStateMatcher]="matcher"
         autocomplete="off"
         onfocus="this.select()"
         class="p-textarea-input"></textarea>

  <mat-error *ngIf="formFieldControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: ToggleComponent

components.templateData:
<p-button class="p-tooltip-container"
          label="Hover"
          buttonType="secondary"
          #tooltip="matTooltip"
          [matTooltip]="message"
          [matTooltipDisabled]="disabled"
          [matTooltipShowDelay]="showDelay"
          [matTooltipHideDelay]="hideDelay"
          [matTooltipPosition]="position"
          [matTooltipClass]="classes">
</p-button>

components.name: TypographyFontFamilyComponent
components.templateData:
Typography / Font families

Source Sans Pro

Used only in caps, bold and 5% letter spacing, on headlines and highlighted areas such as menus, tabs, page titles, etc.

Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-accent
.font-family-accent
.weight-bold

Inter

Used in all the text of the paragraphs and wherever there is text in the lower case such as subheadings, buttons, etc.

Regular

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-regular

Medium

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-medium

Semi Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-semi-bold

Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-bold

variables.name: loremIpsum
